titleStmt.title: A catalogue of medicines for several diseases, communicated for the good of the nation, to prevent people from hazarding their lives, and throwing away their money on those many ignorant pretenders to physic, by a very famous doctor and physician, who by his long study and constant practice, ...

notesStmt.note: Title from first lines of text.
Item at reel position E8:2[212] imperfect: slightly stained at foot of p. 2, affecting text.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
